title: Amy’s Son Lies For Bobby + Will It Uber: Love Poem Edition
itunes:title: Amy’s Son Lies For Bobby + Will It Uber: Love Poem Edition
description:
Amy confronts her son Stevenson about illegally riding in the front seat of Bobby’s car. “Will It Uber” returns with Lunchbox’s attempt to Uber a love poem. Also, Bobby announces the second member of the Bobby Bones Class of 2019.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
